summary: This mod add lanterns around main cities Solitude, Whiterun, Windhelm and Winterhold.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://s15.postimage.org/8wo5jiuuj/copertina.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/12451-2-1331241492.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][youtube]dRGKji2iaYo[/youtube][/center]

* UPDATE * 04 june 2012
New version 2.0: Better lighting, script free, light lit from 5pm to 8am

* UPDATE * 02 june 2012
New version 1.6: Light sources with increased distance view
New version 1.5: Added new lanterns to Markarth and Riften.  Also added other lanterns near Whiterun.

* UPDATE * 14 mar 2012
New version 1.3: Added the bsa file archive for properly working script!

* UPDATE * 9 mar 2012
New version 1.2 with new script. Please update your old mod. SEE INSTRUCTIONS IN README!!!

* OVERVIEW *
This mod add some lanterns along roads to the main cities Solitude, Whiterun, Windhelm, Markarth, Riften and Winterhold.

* INSTALLATION *
Place \"Lanterns Of Skyrim - Around Cities.esp\" into data path and activate it by the menu launcher (option \"data files\")
Run the game and enjoy

* UNINSTALLATION *
Disable the file by the menu launcher and delete it.

* COMPATIBILITY *
This mod will be compatible with any mods installed. It just add more objects and lights.

* SUGGESTION * 
Download and install the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11336]\"Lanterns of Skyrim - Part 1 - Bridges\"[/url]. It add lanterns at the bridges.
[center][img]http://s14.postimage.org/k80wwds2p/bridge.jpg[/img][/center]

Download and install the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=18055]\"Lanterns of Skyrim - Part 3 - Villages\"[/url]. It add lanterns in villages.
[center][img]http://s16.postimage.org/v5yo6kfhx/copertina.jpg[/img][/center]

* BUGS *
Please report to me if you find any bug or anomaly.

[center][size=10pt]Check all my mods![/size]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11336][img]http://s18.postimage.org/z8rwj57jd/bridges.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12451][img]http://s17.postimage.org/rdbunt827/around_cities.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12289][img]http://s7.postimage.org/o16hnl5gr/jja_sunglare.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15139][img]http://s12.postimage.org/r7onu3xml/tiny_sunglare.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11100][img]http://s8.postimage.org/q9sk3q6l1/the_Flicker.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13199][img]http://s15.postimage.org/w7rrgtchn/manny_outpost.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16197][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/16197-1-1335819494.jpg[/img][/url]
[/center]
